title: CyberGamer Open Ladder Update - Finals and Prizes

embed.description: The CyberGamer studio is located in Adelaide at 10 Lagunta Ave, Edwardstown. Spectators are always welcome, view the events above for visitor information or open a support ticket.

body:
Hi summoners,
In a follow up to our [first post](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-events/E4N3TyiI-cybergamer-open-ladder-returns), we're releasing additional information about the CGo.
Namely:
- We've increased the season length by 3 weeks, extra time for games to be played and movement up and down the ladder.
- Finals dates are locked in.
- We've added a $500 prize to the winning team!
- We have a new discord server to help with competitors quicker.

All information that we have is here: http://au.cybergamer.com/forums/thread/612244/CyberGamer-Open-Ladder-Finals-and-Prizes/

Quick reminder of CGo:
- Open ladder, join at any time
- Ends August 27
- ELO system, challenge teams around you
- 5v5 teams
- Free to join and play

We hope to see you taking part!
